creator: Turkuaz Grup Teknoloji
descriptionHtml:
RePOS Waiter is an easy-to-use and fast order, bill receipt and order tracking system. It can be used for businesses using RePOS applications. RePOS Waiter works depending on the RePOS application. RePOS Application can be accessed from the link below.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.repos

Which businesses is RePOS Waiter for?
• Restaurants using RePOS,
• Bars using RePOS,
• Cafes using RePOS,
• Coffeehouses using RePOS,
• All businesses using the RePOS application serving food or beverage.

Which needs does RePOS Waiter meet?
• Allows you to manage your sales and collections, prevents losses and prevents mistakes,
• Provides order tracking integrated with RePOS application,
• Allows your waiters to take orders quickly and without error via mobile devices,
• Ensures that orders are delivered to the safe and kitchen accurately and without delay,
• Allows you to manage your tables,
• Does NOT need internet connection while doing all these.

Key Features
Table QR Code Order:
• Tracking the table orders placed by the customers with the data matrix.

Receiving Order:
• Taking orders with a mobile device
• Quick access to products from the menu divided into groups
• Selecting the product in the menu by scanning it with a phone camera
• Searching for products from the menu by typing on the keyboard
• Easily increase / decrease the number of products selected
• Adding a discount or note
• Organizing table orders

Table Orders:
• Taking orders at the desk with a mobile device
• Online table order tracking with QR code from customers
• Making a reservation at the table and notification of upcoming reservation
• Display of table statuses
• Table account request and payment
• Visitor number entry for the table
• Table change / merge / split
• Order completion
• Requesting an account

Payment:
• Defining cash / credit card / meal voucher payment types
• Displaying change / remaining information
• Payment information sharing (whatsapp, e-mail, etc.)

Peripherals Support:
• Bluetooth printer support
• Ethernet printer support
• Automatic printing and paper cutting
• Barcode reading support with built-in camera

Suitable Devices for Use:
• Android Tablets
• Android Smartphones
• Android Handheld Terminals

The application is completely free for 1,000 orders. After 1,000 orders, all functions will be available with a monthly payment.

TURKUAZ GRUP TEKNOLOJİ LİMİTED ŞİRKETİ
TOBB Ekonomi ve Teknoloji Üniversitesi
Kuluçka Merkezi
Çukurambar / ANKARA TURKEY

creator: Turkuaz Grup Teknoloji Ltd. Şti.
descriptionHtml:
RePOS Waiter is an easy-to-use and fast order, bill receipt and order tracking system. It can be used for businesses using RePOS applications. RePOS Waiter works depending on the RePOS application. RePOS Application can be accessed from the link below.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.repos

Which businesses is RePOS Waiter for?
• Restaurants using RePOS,
• Bars using RePOS,
• Cafes using RePOS,
• Coffeehouses using RePOS,
• All businesses using the RePOS application serving food or beverage.

Which needs does RePOS Waiter meet?
• Allows you to manage your sales and collections, prevents losses and prevents mistakes,
• Provides order tracking integrated with RePOS application,
• Allows your waiters to take orders quickly and without error via mobile devices,
• Ensures that orders are delivered to the safe and kitchen accurately and without delay,
• Allows you to manage your tables,
• Does NOT need internet connection while doing all these.

Key Features
Table QR Code Order:
• Tracking the table orders placed by the customers with the data matrix.

Receiving Order:
• Taking orders with a mobile device
• Quick access to products from the menu divided into groups
• Selecting the product in the menu by scanning it with a phone camera
• Searching for products from the menu by typing on the keyboard
• Easily increase / decrease the number of products selected
• Adding a discount or note
• Organizing table orders

Table Orders:
• Taking orders at the desk with a mobile device
• Online table order tracking with QR code from customers
• Making a reservation at the table and notification of upcoming reservation
• Display of table statuses
• Table account request and payment
• Visitor number entry for the table
• Table change / merge / split
• Order completion
• Requesting an account

Payment:
• Defining cash / credit card / meal voucher payment types
• Displaying change / remaining information
• Payment information sharing (whatsapp, e-mail, etc.)

Peripherals Support:
• Bluetooth printer support
• Ethernet printer support
• Automatic printing and paper cutting
• Barcode reading support with built-in camera

Suitable Devices for Use:
• Android Tablets
• Android Smartphones
• Android Handheld Terminals

The application is completely free for 1,000 orders. After 1,000 orders, all functions will be available with a monthly payment.

To contact us on any subject:
Telephone: +90 534 645 82 01
WhatsApp: https://wa.me/905346458201
E-mail: iletisim@turkuaz-grup.com
Web: http://repos.turkuaz-grup.com

title: RePOS Waiter: Restaurant POS Waiter Application

container.value:
TURKUAZ GRUP TEKNOLOJİ LİMİTED ŞİRKETİ

creator: Turkuaz Grup Teknoloji Ltd. Şti.
descriptionHtml:
RePOS Waiter is an easy-to-use and fast order, bill receipt and order tracking system. It can be used for businesses using RePOS applications. RePOS Waiter works depending on the RePOS application. RePOS Application can be accessed from the link below.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.repos

Which businesses is RePOS Waiter for?
• Restaurants using RePOS,
• Bars using RePOS,
• Cafes using RePOS,
• Coffeehouses using RePOS,
• All businesses using the RePOS application serving food or beverage.

Which needs does RePOS Waiter meet?
• Allows you to manage your sales and collections, prevents losses and prevents mistakes,
• Provides order tracking integrated with RePOS application,
• Allows your waiters to take orders quickly and without error via mobile devices,
• Ensures that orders are delivered to the safe and kitchen accurately and without delay,
• Allows you to manage your tables,
• Does NOT need internet connection while doing all these.

Key Features
Table QR Code Order:
• Tracking the table orders placed by the customers with the data matrix.

Receiving Order:
• Taking orders with a mobile device
• Quick access to products from the menu divided into groups
• Selecting the product in the menu by scanning it with a phone camera
• Searching for products from the menu by typing on the keyboard
• Easily increase / decrease the number of products selected
• Adding a discount or note
• Organizing table orders

Table Orders:
• Taking orders at the desk with a mobile device
• Online table order tracking with QR code from customers
• Making a reservation at the table and notification of upcoming reservation
• Display of table statuses
• Table account request and payment
• Visitor number entry for the table
• Table change / merge / split
• Order completion
• Requesting an account

Payment:
• Defining cash / credit card / meal voucher payment types
• Displaying change / remaining information
• Payment information sharing (whatsapp, e-mail, etc.)

Peripherals Support:
• Bluetooth printer support
• Ethernet printer support
• Automatic printing and paper cutting
• Barcode reading support with built-in camera

Suitable Devices for Use:
• Android Tablets
• Android Smartphones
• Android Handheld Terminals

The application is completely free for 1,000 orders. After 1,000 orders, all functions will be available with a monthly payment.

To contact us on any subject:
Telephone: +90 534 645 82 01
WhatsApp: https://wa.me/905346458201
E-mail: iletisim@turkuaz-grup.com
Web: http://repos.turkuaz-grup.com

descriptionHtml:
RePOS Waiter is an easy-to-use and fast order, bill receipt and order tracking system. It can be used for businesses using RePOS applications. RePOS Waiter works depending on the RePOS application. RePOS Application can be accessed from the link below.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.repos

Which businesses is RePOS Waiter for?
• Restaurants using RePOS,
• Bars using RePOS,
• Cafes using RePOS,
• Coffeehouses using RePOS,
• All businesses using the RePOS application serving food or beverage.

Which needs does RePOS Waiter meet?
• Allows you to manage your sales and collections, prevents losses and prevents mistakes,
• Provides order tracking integrated with RePOS application,
• Allows your waiters to take orders quickly and without error via mobile devices,
• Ensures that orders are delivered to the safe and kitchen accurately and without delay,
• Allows you to manage your tables,
• Does NOT need internet connection while doing all these.

Key Features
Table QR Code Order:
• Tracking the table orders placed by the customers with the data matrix.

Receiving Order:
• Taking orders with a mobile device
• Quick access to products from the menu divided into groups
• Selecting the product in the menu by scanning it with a phone camera
• Searching for products from the menu by typing on the keyboard
• Easily increase / decrease the number of products selected
• Adding a discount or note
• Organizing table orders

Table Orders:
• Taking orders at the desk with a mobile device
• Online table order tracking with QR code from customers
• Making a reservation at the table and notification of upcoming reservation
• Display of table statuses
• Table account request and payment
• Visitor number entry for the table
• Table change / merge / split
• Order completion
• Requesting an account

Payment:
• Defining cash / credit card / meal voucher payment types
• Displaying change / remaining information
• Payment information sharing (whatsapp, e-mail, etc.)

Peripherals Support:
• Bluetooth printer support
• Ethernet printer support
• Automatic printing and paper cutting
• Barcode reading support with built-in camera

• Android Tablets
• Android Smartphones
• Android Handheld Terminals

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.repos

Which businesses is RePOS Waiter for?
• Restaurants using RePOS,
• Bars using RePOS,
• Cafes using RePOS,
• Coffeehouses using RePOS,
• All businesses using the RePOS application serving food or beverage.

Which needs does RePOS Waiter meet?
• Allows you to manage your sales and collections, prevents losses and prevents mistakes,
• Provides order tracking integrated with RePOS application,
• Allows your waiters to take orders quickly and without error via mobile devices,
• Ensures that orders are delivered to the safe and kitchen accurately and without delay,
• Allows you to manage your tables,
• Does NOT need internet connection while doing all these.

Key Features
Table QR Code Order:
• Tracking the table orders placed by the customers with the data matrix.

Receiving Order:
• Taking orders with a mobile device
• Quick access to products from the menu divided into groups
• Selecting the product in the menu by scanning it with a phone camera
• Searching for products from the menu by typing on the keyboard
• Easily increase / decrease the number of products selected
• Adding a discount or note
• Organizing table orders

Table Orders:
• Taking orders at the desk with a mobile device
• Online table order tracking with QR code from customers
• Making a reservation at the table and notification of upcoming reservation
• Display of table statuses
• Table account request and payment
• Visitor number entry for the table
• Table change / merge / split
• Order completion
• Requesting an account

Payment:
• Defining cash / credit card / meal voucher payment types
• Displaying change / remaining information
• Payment information sharing (whatsapp, e-mail, etc.)

Peripherals Support:
• Bluetooth printer support
• Ethernet printer support
• Automatic printing and paper cutting
• Barcode reading support with built-in camera

Suitable Devices for Use:
• Android Tablets
• Android Smartphones
• Android Handheld Terminals

The application is completely free for 1,000 orders. After 1,000 orders, all functions will be available with a monthly payment.

To contact us on any subject:
Telephone: +90 534 645 82 01
WhatsApp: https://wa.me/905346458201
E-mail: iletisim@turkuaz-grup.com
Web: http://repos.turkuaz-grup.com

Which businesses is RePOS Waiter for?
• Restaurants using RePOS,
• Bars using RePOS,
• Cafes using RePOS,
• Coffeehouses using RePOS,
• All businesses using the RePOS application serving food or beverage.

Which needs does RePOS Waiter meet?
• Allows you to manage your sales and collections, prevents losses and prevents mistakes,
• Provides order tracking integrated with RePOS application,
• Allows your waiters to take orders quickly and without error via mobile devices,
• Ensures that orders are delivered to the safe and kitchen accurately and without delay,
• Allows you to manage your tables,
• Does NOT need internet connection while doing all these.

Key Features
Table QR Code Order:
• Tracking the table orders placed by the customers with the data matrix.

Receiving Order:
• Taking orders with a mobile device
• Quick access to products from the menu divided into groups
• Selecting the product in the menu by scanning it with a phone camera
• Searching for products from the menu by typing on the keyboard
• Easily increase / decrease the number of products selected
• Adding a discount or note
• Organizing table orders

Table Orders:
• Taking orders at the desk with a mobile device
• Online table order tracking with QR code from customers
• Making a reservation at the table and notification of upcoming reservation
• Display of table statuses
• Table account request and payment
• Visitor number entry for the table
• Table change / merge / split
• Order completion
• Requesting an account

Payment:
• Defining cash / credit card / meal voucher payment types
• Displaying change / remaining information
• Payment information sharing (whatsapp, e-mail, etc.)

Peripherals Support:
• Bluetooth printer support
• Ethernet printer support
• Automatic printing and paper cutting
• Barcode reading support with built-in camera

Suitable Devices for Use:
• Android Tablets
• Android Smartphones
• Android Handheld Terminals
